localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

nodes.excerpt: Cadoo is the most intense way to reach your fitness goals. â € Browse challenges, commit to a fitness goal, use a fitness tracker to track your progress. Winners get their money back + extra money from the challenge losers.
nodes.title: Cadoo - Your running drill coach that motivates you with money
nodes.author: Chris Messina

nodes.excerpt: Hue Sentiment is an easy to use Philips Hue light app which translates text into a mood. Simply type how you're feeling and notice the lights change based on your mood.
nodes.title: Hue Sentiment - Control lights with your mood
nodes.author: rihab

nodes.excerpt: CopyCat is a DeepFake app for content creators. Users can create hilarious prank videos, viral social media content, celebrity lip syncs, and more with just the touch of a button!
nodes.title: CopyCat Aâ€ªIâ€¬ - Swap your face and become anybody instantly

nodes.excerpt: Canâ€™t remember where you saved your Bank Account Number? Need quick access to your CV or the digital copy of your Passport? Thatâ€™s why we created Clipboard PRO: the easiest way to find, copy and paste all your information with a tap!
nodes.title: Clipboard PRO - Fast access to all your most used content
nodes.author: Giuseppe Travasoni

nodes.excerpt: Tasterboxes are packed full of nutritious new treats straight from our favorite startups. Are your tastebuds ready to discover their next favorite foods? Each box is curated for your dietary needs. Vegan? GF, low carb? No problem. Find your perfect https://tastermonial.com/pages/tasterbox-quiz
nodes.title: Tasterbox - Curated food box for your palate + your gut
nodes.author: Catherine Work

nodes.excerpt: Hyper is an animoji voice chat app for gamers & anime fans. Meet people and voice chat, without the anxiety of revealing your real face. We give you tools to draw, voice chat, and more. The more time you spend, the more coins you earn for new characters.
nodes.title: Hyper Online - Animoji social network for people into games and anime.
nodes.author: Michael Seibel

nodes.excerpt: ğŸ’¸ Z1 is a digital bank for teenagers in LatAm, where they can spend and receive money through a prepaid Mastercard credit card. Z1 gives teenagers autonomy and teaches them financial literacy from their first contact with money all throughout their adulthoodâœ¨
nodes.title: Z1 - Digital bank for teenagers in Latam
nodes.author: Michael Seibel

nodes.excerpt: Read RSS news as instagram stories! Discover the new way of reading news. This app uses many techniques to generate stories from feeds that don't support natively stories. It works with all yours feeds! Don't waste time for boring news apps.
nodes.title: Stories Now - Read RSS news as instagram stories! For iOS and Android. â˜•
nodes.author: b4rtaz

nodes.excerpt: Start creating your app with clean mind and clear representing of screen structure. There are 12 device mockups in the pack, for both iPhone and Android. Carefully created A4 format templates that perfectly repeat the real device sizes. PNG, JPG, PDF formats.
nodes.title: Printables - Free printable templates for your mobile sketching
nodes.author: Vitaly Belousov

nodes.excerpt: Post.co is the best way to share big and small news across your team. Designed as a substitute for messy threads and awkward reply-all team emails, Post is a simple, low-stakes way to share team-wide updates. Great for remote teams to stay connected.
nodes.title: Post - The simplest way to post big or small news across your team.
nodes.author: Roberto Sanabria

nodes.excerpt: If thinking about money gives you a headache, you're in the right place. Worth it is here to make it as simple as possible, simply list your assets balances (ğŸ’°, ğŸš—, ğŸ ,.) and update it at your own pace. Download it for iOS and Android today!
nodes.title: Worth it - Keeping track of your money, the simple way
nodes.author: Maxime Mazzone

nodes.excerpt: Charge Running is a mobile app that provides live running classes with others from all over the world! Trainers will update you on your stats and interact with you and your fellow runners in our real-time chat room.
nodes.title: Charge Running - Social running app with real-time coaching
nodes.author: Michael Seibel

nodes.excerpt: Life is a magical journey; why not getting some souvenirs out of it? 1. Open the app. 2. Write down 3 things you are thankful for that day. 3. That's it! We are working on exciting features. Have fun with the innovative Souvenir gratitude tracker app!
nodes.title: Souvenir - A gratitude journal to track the good in your life
nodes.author: John Caffier

nodes.excerpt: Itâ€™s time for Planny 5. Planny 5 combines an all new design with many new features. Start to plan your day, complete all your daily tasks and review your recent productivity. Three simple steps to become more productive over time.
nodes.title: Planny 5 - Plan and complete daily tasks across your Apple devices
nodes.author: Kevin

nodes.excerpt: End-to-end spend management for companies in LatAm. Issue unlimited physical or virtual cards, set limits for each, get real-time visibility of your teamâ€™s spend, and save valuable time on tedious tasks like invoice matching.
nodes.title: Clara - Clear, simplified spend management for companies in LatAm
nodes.author: Kevin William David

nodes.excerpt: Hypernotes is a knowledge management app with bi-directional linking, outlining, and super-powered collaboration features.
nodes.title: Hypernotes - Create, share, and understand knowledge in a new way
nodes.author: Martin Welker

nodes.excerpt: uPaste for Mac will record and organize your copy/paste history automatically. Then you can use your pasteboard content anytime, any where with elegant beautiful UI.
nodes.title: uPaste - Smart clipboard manager for Mac
nodes.author: ChengHao Wu

nodes.excerpt: warpAR is a free augmented reality app for iOS that lets you distort the textures of the real world. Tap and drag to reshape buildings or turn murals into swirls of color using a set of liquify tools.
nodes.title: warpAR - Distort real world textures using augmented reality
nodes.author: Matt Bierner

nodes.excerpt: Waterful is a fresh take on water reminder apps. With multiple healthy challenges to take, friendly notifications to follow & our cute octopus to keep you company, staying hydrated becomes fun.
nodes.title: Waterful - Turn daily hydration into a fun habit
nodes.author: Chris Messina

nodes.excerpt: Graze is the first true Video Based Social Networking App. Why waste endless time messaging and going on disappointing dates? Instead, you can spend 5 minutes or less on a Video Chat to find out if you have chemistry and a dynamic worth exploring in person.
nodes.title: Graze - Video first social networking for dating & meeting friends
nodes.author: Heather Hopkins

nodes.excerpt: Bazar is a curated platform of your favorite local artists, artisans, and merchants in the form of a mobile marketplace! Bazar Merchant serves a mobile Point of Sale capable of connecting to the Bazar Marketplace, where merchants can create and manage shops.
nodes.title: Bazar - Platform for local artists, artisans, and merchants
nodes.author: Madhav Soni

nodes.excerpt: Find the five differences in each of the countless varied pictures in a given time. With daily challenges, as well as recurring events on great themes. Train your brain and your attention in the addictive puzzle game and keep yourself fit.
nodes.title: Differences - A spot difference puzzle game
nodes.author: LostVision Gamestudio

nodes.excerpt: Organize and collaborate on trips with friends and family! Completely FREE, with per-plan privacy, real-time syncing, Google maps integration, apps on web and mobile, offline mode, and more! Say goodbye to your planning headaches and start planning with Plip
nodes.title: Plip Trip Planner - Organize and collaborate on trips with friends and family
nodes.author: Max Korbel
